Title: 3 BHK Builder Floor for Sale in Gopanpalle Hyderabad
Description: Presenting a spacious 3 BHK builder floor for sale in the highly sought-after and upscale locality of Gopanapalli, Hyderabad. This under-construction property offers a perfect blend of modern design and luxurious living in one of the city’s most prestigious neighborhoods.::::::Property Specifications ::::::This expansive 3 BHK builder floor, located on the 3rd floor of a 5-storeyed building, offers a super built-up area of 1850 sq. ft. Thoughtfully designed and vaastu compliant, this east-facing property ensures positive energy flow and abundant natural light throughout the day. The flat is unfurnished, providing a blank canvas to personalise to your taste. It features three spacious bedrooms, each with an attached western-style bathroom equipped with geyser points, ensuring comfort and convenience for your family.::::::The property includes three balconies, each attached to a bedroom and offering serene park views, making them perfect spots for morning coffee or evening relaxation. The layout is well-planned with a separate living and dining area, providing ample space for entertaining guests. Additionally, there is a dedicated puja room, enhancing the spiritual ambience of the home. The modular kitchen is modern and functional, complete with a piped gas connection and an attached utility area, adding to the convenience of daily living. The vitrified flooring throughout the flat adds a touch of elegance and is easy to maintain.::::::Facilities ::::::The builder floor offers top-notch facilities, including ample parking with 10 covered and 5 open spaces available. Water supply is reliable, with both borewell and corporation sources ensuring uninterrupted availability. The building has 100% power backup, round-the-clock security guard service, and CCTV surveillance for your peace of mind. A lift is available for easy access to all floors, ensuring convenience for residents.::::::Locality ::::::The locality of Gopanapalli is highly desirable, with proximity to key landmarks such as Navodaya School and Manjeer Diamond Towers. Essential amenities like hospitals, malls, supermarkets, banks, and ATMs are all within a short distance, making daily errands effortless. Public transport options are readily available, with the Lingampally Metro Station 3 km away, providing seamless connectivity to the rest of Hyderabad.::
